Class ScrollingBackground

java.lang.Object
game.graphics.ScrollingBackground
public class ScrollingBackground extends Object
Manages infinitely scrolling background layers with parallax effect. Used for clouds, mountains, and other background elements.

Features:

  • Seamless horizontal scrolling with automatic wrapping
  • Configurable scroll speed for parallax effects
  • Opacity and scale control
  • Supports sprite sheets with horizontal frame layout

Parallax effect: Slower layers (mountains) move slower than faster layers (clouds) to create depth perception.

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private int
    frameCount
    Number of frames in the sprite sheet
    private double
    frameHeight
    Height of each individual frame in pixels
    private double
    frameWidth
    Width of each individual frame in pixels
    private double
    offset
    Current horizontal scroll offset in pixels (wraps around totalWidth)
    private double
    opacity
    Opacity of the layer (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = opaque)
    private double
    scale
    Scale multiplier for rendering (1.0 = original size)
    private javafx.scene.image.Image
    spriteSheet
    Sprite sheet image containing all frames laid out horizontally
    private double
    totalWidth
    Total width of all frames combined (frameWidth * frameCount)
    private double
    yPosition
    Vertical position where this layer should be rendered

  • Constructor Details

    • ScrollingBackground

      public ScrollingBackground(javafx.scene.image.Image spriteSheet, int frameCount, double frameWidth, double frameHeight, double yPosition, double scale, double opacity)
      Create a scrolling background layer
      Parameters:
      spriteSheet - The sprite sheet containing all frames
      frameCount - Number of frames in horizontal layout
      frameWidth - Width of each frame
      frameHeight - Height of each frame
      yPosition - Y position to render at
      scale - Scale multiplier for rendering
      opacity - Opacity (0.0 to 1.0)

    • update

      public void update(double scrollSpeed, double dt)
      Update offset based on scroll speed
      Parameters:
      scrollSpeed - Pixels per second
      dt - Delta time in seconds

      Render the scrolling background
      Parameters:
      gc - GraphicsContext to draw on
      canvasWidth - Width of canvas to fill
